name: Sax Dueler
description:
To participate in Weekly Game Jam #179 with the theme "Duel", I made this rhythm based game where you play the notes of the saxophone against a saxophonist. This saxophonist is a perfectionist so try to keep up with him!

Music done by Cristian Gonzalez.

Controls: A, S, D, F, G for key presses and ESC to pause.
